# List for function

REGS_FF <- function(X){
  
  XA <- as.vector(X$model[c(1)])
  names(XA)[1]<- "y"
  XB <- as.data.frame(X$model[c(-1)])
  
  XC <- as.data.frame(cbind(XB,XA))
  XMT <- regsubsets(y ~., data = XC)
  print(summary(XMT))

res.sum <- summary(XMT)

xp <- data.frame(
  Adj.R2 = which.max(res.sum$adjr2),
  CP = which.min(res.sum$cp),
  BIC = which.min(res.sum$bic)
)

print(xp)
}
